title: Empowering Clinicians with Medical Decision Transformers: A Framework for Sepsis Treatment
details: AA Rahman, P Agarwal, R Noumeir, P Jouvet… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Offline reinforcement learning has shown promise for solving tasks in safety-critical settings, such as clinical decision support. Its application, however, has been limited by the lack of interpretability and interactivity for clinicians. To address these …
